dcterms:creator: Marinka Zitnik
Monica Agrawal
Jure Leskovec
dcterms:description: The DDI dataset is used for drug-drug interaction prediction, focusing on the Drug-Drug Interaction subset where each drug is represented as a graph with atoms as nodes and chemical bonds as edges.
dcterms:title: DDI dataset

dcterms:creator: Yunsheng Bai
Hao Ding
Song Bian
Ting Chen
Yizhou Sun
Wei Wang
dcterms:description: The AIDS dataset contains chemical compound structure graphs with labeled nodes, commonly used in graph similarity search.
dcterms:title: AIDS dataset

dcterms:creator: Xiaoli Wang
Xiaofeng Ding
Anthony KH Tung
Shanshan Ying
Hai Jin
dcterms:description: The LINUX dataset consists of program dependence graphs generated from the Linux kernel, where nodes represent statements and edges denote dependencies between them.
dcterms:title: LINUX dataset

dcterms:creator: Pinar Yanardag
SVN Vishwanathan
dcterms:description: The IMDB dataset contains graphs where nodes represent actors or actresses, and edges denote that two people appear in the same movie, used for graph similarity prediction.
dcterms:title: IMDB dataset
